title: Is it mandatory to do dhikr after salah / prayer? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: the vicar we make after the salat Subhan Allah alhamdulillah Allah Akbar 33 times etc ayatul kursi the three coals and the other earth car is this mandatory the answer is no I don't know of anyone to have said that it is mandatory it is highly recommended if you do it you reward it if you skip it you're not sinful
